Class ViewGroupAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>

          • org.assertj.android.api.view.ViewGroupAssert

  • public final class ViewGroupAssert
extends AbstractViewGroupAssert<ViewGroupAssert,android.view.ViewGroup>
    Assertions for ViewGroup instances.

    This class is final. To extend use AbstractViewGroupAssert.
